servicesProvided.name: Visioning and Strategy Development for Businesses
Voice of the customer, product consortia

properties.description:
Dansk Produktions Univers (DPU) is organised as a non-profit organisation for SME's within production in Denmark.

We work with memberrelated areas such as digitalization, automatization, organisational development, talent attraction both for members and non-members. We are widely represented with collaboration with others within produciton and SME's interests

evolutionaryStage.name: In preparation
evolutionaryStage.description: A consortium exists, but has not yet been formalized

properties.digitizationLink: The activities of the hub are well aligned with Denrmark's national initiative for digitising industry, MADE - Manufacturing Academy of Denmark.
properties.name: Dansk Produktions Univers
